Comments_List: Over the course of five weeks I was able to grasp a better command of reading Latin; both poetry and prose. In addition, this course provided me with a review of Latin grammar concepts.

This felt like the first time I read "real" Latin, which made all the grammar from the previous semester feel much more meaningful! I also found that focusing on the text, and getting a glimpse of these principles in the context in which they were written, helped me learn them much faster and remember them more quickly.
There is a semester's worth workload condensed into five weeks which means that there is a lot of material to cover and not all that much time to get through it in-depth.
Yes, if a student is looking to achieve a better grasp of reading Latin, this course will be beneficial.
